mapper.select: SELECT P.IN_ID AS inId,P.QUANTITY AS quantity,P.IN_USER AS inUser,P.REMARK AS remark,P.CREATE_TIME AS createTime,M.NAME AS materialName,M.MATERIAL_ID AS materialId,M.MATERIAL_CODE AS materialCode,M.UNIT AS unit, M.BRAND AS brand,M.MODEL AS model,(SELECT U.USER_NAME FROM USER_INFO U WHERE U.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND U.ACCOUNT_ID=P.IN_USER) AS inUserName, (SELECT A.TITLE FROM PROJECT_BUILD_MATERIAL_PURCHASE A WHERE A.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND A.PURCHASE_ID=P.PURCHASE_ID) AS title FROM PROJECT_BUILD_MATERIAL_IN P,PROJECT_BUILD_MATERIAL M WHERE P.ORG_ID = M.ORG_ID AND P.MATERIAL_ID = M.MATERIAL_ID AND P.ORG_ID=#{orgId} AND P.PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} AND P.MATERIAL_ID=#{materialId}
